basics.name: Ratnangshu Das
basics.label: PhD Student, Prime Minister’s Research Fellow
basics.summary: I am a Prime Minister’s Research Fellow at the Robert Bosch Centre for Cyber-Physical Systems (RBCCPS), Indian Institute of Science (IISc) Bangalore, working in the FOCAS Lab under Prof. Pushpak Jagtap. My research focuses on formal methods and scalable, disturbance-robust control for unknown nonlinear systems under complex temporal logic specifications.

work.name: RBCCPS, Indian Institute of Science (IISc) Bangalore
work.summary: Research on formal methods, spatiotemporal tubes, temporal logic, resilience, and approximation-free control of unknown nonlinear systems.

work.name: IIT Kanpur – Telemedicine and Medical Robotics
work.summary: Worked in the Center of Excellence in Telemedicine & Healthcare Robotics.

work.name: TU Delft – Cognitive Robotics Department
work.summary: Worked on ungrounded force-feedback mechanisms in portable haptic devices.

work.name: MPI-IS Stuttgart – Haptic Intelligence Department
work.summary: Worked on Haptipedia, a database of haptic devices.

work.name: IIT Kanpur – Humanoid Robotics Lab
work.summary: Worked on robotics, control, and formal verification.
